reviewText: couldn't use it (VHS); gave it away..
I loved being able to find this movie! It's a tough movie to find!  I love being able to relate to the characters in the film. Very well acted on all ends.

I'm not a fan of Victoria Principal, but I have to give her credit that she really played her part very well.
However my favorite actor in this TV movie is Paul Sorvino as the compassionate cop.
The book is one of the best thrillers I ever read...it's too bad that Marjorie Dorner stopped writing books about 10 years ago.
